Text.val: With this program it is possible to enter payments which were received from
This program creates new lines in MQ89. Then with OMQ089 the client manager can
decide to send the letters which then is handled by BXA039.
13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901

05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
22.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls BMQ001 by the BMQ005
After succesfull validation go to the first field on the screen
